title: Switch web framework from Express to Fastify
context: API response times are inconsistent and we need better observability hooks. Current middleware stack is fragile.
motivation: Improve performance and consistency while keeping developer ergonomics.

alternatives_considered.name: Stay on Express
alternatives_considered.why_not: Performance issues persist and plugins are not standardized across services.

alternatives_considered.name: Migrate to Fastify
alternatives_considered.why_not: Selected option; meets performance and schema validation needs.

assumptions: Platform team can update shared middleware
notes: Start with greenfield services before core APIs.
